{{infobox character | name=Ithilbor | people=[[Guest-elves|Guest-elf]] | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position=Chief of the [[Guest-elves]] | location=[[Doriath]] | affiliation= | language=[[Sindarin]] | birth=[[First Age]] | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage= | siblings= | spouse= | children=[[Saeros]] | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Ithilbor''' was the chief of the [[Guest-elves]], and a member of [[Thingol]]'s council.{{GA|38|note}}, p. 112 Nothing else is known about him, except that he was the father of [[Saeros]], a Green-elf of [[Arthórien]] who resided long in Thingol's court in [[Menegroth]].{{UT|Narn}}, ''Túrin in Doriath'' == Etymology == His name is not given an explanation but is apparently composed of the [[Sindarin]] words ''[[Ithil]]'' + ''-[[paur]]'', which translates as "Moon-fist". == Genealogy == {{familytree/start}} {{familytree| ITH | |ITH='''ITHILBOR'''
